description: This is an example configuration file. You can use this as a template for creating your own configuration file.

platforms.name: FibaroHC
platforms.url: PUT URL OR IP OF YOUR HOME CENTER HERE CONTAINING PROTOCOL AND NAME E.G.: https://hc-00000XXX.local OR IP E.G.: 192.168.1.100
platforms.username: PUT USERNAME OF YOUR HOME CENTER HERE
platforms.password: PUT PASSWORD OF YOUR HOME CENTER HERE
platforms.pollerperiod: PUT 0 FOR DISABLING POLLING, 1 - 100 INTERVAL IN SECONDS. 2 SECONDS IS THE DEFAULT
platforms.thermostatmaxtemperature: SET MAX TEMPERATURE FOR THERMOSTATIC DEVICES (DEFAULT 100C)
platforms.switchglobalvariables: PUT A COMMA SEPARATED LIST OF HOME CENTER GLOBAL VARIABLES ACTING LIKE A BISTABLE SWITCH
platforms.dimmerglobalvariables: PUT A COMMA SEPARATED LIST OF HOME CENTER GLOBAL VARIABLES ACTING LIKE A DIMMER
platforms.adminUsername: PUT ADMIN USERNAME OF YOUR HOME CENTER HERE TO SET GLOBAL VARIABLES
platforms.adminPassword: PUT ADMIN PASSWORD OF YOUR HOME CENTER HERE TO SET GLOBAL VARIABLES
platforms.securitysystem: PUT enabled OR disabled IN ORDER TO MANAGE THE AVAILABILITY OF THE SECURITY SYSTEM
platforms.addRoomNameToDeviceName: PUT enabled OR disabled IN ORDER TO ADD THE ROOM NAME TO DEVICE NAME. DEFAULT disabled
platforms.doorbellDeviceId: PUT HOME CENTER BINARY SENSOR DEVICE ID ACTING AS A DOORBELL
platforms.logsLevel: PUT THE DESIRED LOG LEVEL: 0 DISABLED, 1 ONLY CHANGES, 2 ALL
